extDesc.message: A minimal extension for biometric device Fingkey Hamster using eNBioBSP SDK and native messaging protocol.

popup_desc.message: Click the buttons to test the extension functionalities

popup_desc2.message: (the extension uses the first detected device by default)

background_noDataReceived.message: No data received from native app

background_installPrompt.message: Please install the NBioBSP Extension Setup
